game.name: Combat Mission: Red Thunder
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Combat Mission Red Thunder focuses on the hard fought Eastern Front battles of Bagration and Poland, from the swamps of Belarus to the gates of Warsaw during the summer of 1944.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Combat Mission Red Thunder focuses on the hard fought Eastern Front battles of Bagration and Poland, from the swamps of Belarus to the gates of Warsaw during the summer of 1944.

reviewHighlights.text: 비추! 최적화는 진짜.. 개판임 이겜 시리즈들 공통점임 개판임... 비추임... 뭔 생각으로 다른 겜을 추천눌렀을까.. ㅠㅠ
